TextView.android:text: OUR VISION SOLAR for every home, building and rooftop. SOLAR for every city and village.

The Sun has been around since life has existed, is perhaps the oldest thing known to mankind and will continue to be omnipresent for years to come. In large sections of our society, we worship the Sun as it is considered holy and powerful. It belongs to everyone equally and is the ultimate source of energy. Our mission is to channel this energy to power every roof, every home, every building, every village and every city of our country. Everyone should be able to proudly proclaim – it’s SPA. That’s why we created SPA. The recent innovations and rapid deployment of large-scale solar projects have lead to a better quality and a much lower cost solar power. Still, solar has not percolated down to our homes, offices and everyday lives and we continue to pay a very high price for electricity.
